```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(hubr)
```


```{r, fig.width=6, fig.height=4}
x=c(rnorm(130,3,2),
    rnorm(220,10,2),
    rnorm(500,2,2),
    rnorm(50,-4,2),
    rnorm(30,2,2),
    rnorm(120,8,2))
seg_obj=Hubert_segmentation(x)
plot(x)
lines(model_signal(x,seg_obj$locations), col="red",lwd=3)
```

```{r, fig.width=6, fig.height=4}
x=c(rnorm(130,3,2),
    rnorm(220,5,2),
    rnorm(500,4,2),
    rnorm(50,6,2),
    rnorm(30,4,2),
    rnorm(120,3,2))
seg_obj=Hubert_segmentation(x)
plot(x)
lines(model_signal(x,seg_obj$locations), col="red",lwd=3)
```
